content.question: Using the source provided, respond to all parts of the question. A. Identify the research method used in the study.

frqParts.text: Using the source provided, respond to all parts of the question. A. Identify the research method used in the study.
B. State the operational definition of the type of pain that is treated with group therapy.
C. Describe what the small effect size indicates.
D. Identify one ethical guideline described in the study. Describe one way the researchers in the study applied this ethical guideline.
E. Explain the extent to which the research findings may or may not be generalizable using specific and relevant evidence from the study.

F. Explain how at least one of the research findings supports or refutes the idea that a combination of medication and psychological therapies is more effective than a single intervention for pain management.

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
